page.title: 16Schools of the Area
page.content: The High School in Rubery is that of Waseley Hills High School. It caters for children from the ages of 12 to 18. It offers the children of the area the oppportunity to take external examinations to all levels at the age of 16, and indeed also has a sixth form to enable the pupils to take 'A' levels also. Three schools feed this High School, namely Gannow Middle School, Beaconside First and Middle School and Lickey First and Middle School. Gannow is on the same site as the High School. It caters for children from the age of 8 to 12. Callowbrook First School feeds Gannow, and hence children start their education at the age of 5 years at Callowbrook.
